resources.string: "After RuiTime is installed, you can start monitoring the frequency and amount of time you spend in your applications."

"RuiTime follows your applications' daily running, it will get your permission to upload the statistics periodically to cloud server. With these data analyzed, RuiTime will provide you the best suggestion of application time management."
Swipe and navigate to next page
"In addition to the default notification drawer app shortcut bar, you can add and customize a widget for launching apps. Specify the color, size, quantity, background color and more."

"You can also pin apps to be permanently anchored. Got an icon pack you like? Hangar supports icon packs and even the ability to manually change an individual app\'s icon.\n\nFinally, you can exclude apps from showing up with the blacklist option. Do all this and more from the Hangar Apps tab."

"RuiTime is a lightweight tool that makes launching apps convenient from anywhere in Android.

To enjoy the full benefits of this tool, it should have at least a day's worth of monitored app statistics to base its recommendations on.

Enjoy and thank you for trying RuiTime!"
